feed.title: Spark NLP
feed.subtitle: High Performance NLP with Apache Spark

entry.title: English algmonquestingansweringmodel_base RoBertaForQuestionAnswering from weijiang2009
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained RoBertaForQuestionAnswering model, adapted from Hugging Face and curated to provide scalability and production-readiness using Spark NLP.algmonquestingansweringmodel_base is a English model originally trained by weijiang2009.

Download Copy S3 URI

How to use



document_assembler = MultiDocumentAssembler() \
    .setInputCol(["question", "context"]) \
    .setOutputCol(["document_question", "document_context"])
    
    
spanClassifier = RoBertaForQuestionAnswering.pretrained("algmonquestingansweringmodel_base","en") \
            .setInputCols(["document_question","document_context"]) \
            .setOutputCol("answer")

pipeline = Pipeline().setStages([document_assembler, spanClassifier])

pipelineModel = pipeline.fit(data)

pipelineDF = pipelineModel.transform(data)




val document_assembler = new MultiDocumentAssembler()
    .setInputCol(Array("question", "context")) 
    .setOutputCol(Array("document_question", "document_context"))
    
val spanClassifier = RoBertaForQuestionAnswering  
    .pretrained("algmonquestingansweringmodel_base", "en")
    .setInputCols(Array("document_question","document_context")) 
    .setOutputCol("answer") 

val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document_assembler, spanClassifier))

val pipelineModel = pipeline.fit(data)

val pipelineDF = pipelineModel.transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: algmonquestingansweringmodel_base
Compatibility: Spark NLP 5.2.1+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [document_question, document_context]
Output Labels: [answer]
Language: en
Size: 463.5 MB

References

https://huggingface.co/weijiang2009/AlgmonQuestingAnsweringModel-base
entry.summary: Description Pretrained RoBertaForQuestionAnswering model, adapted from Hugging Face and curated to provide scalability and production-readiness using Spark NLP.algmonquestingansweringmodel_base is a English model originally trained by weijiang2009. Live Demo Open in Colab Download Copy S3 URI How to use PythonScalaNLU document_assembler = MultiDocumentAssembler() \ .setInputCol(["question", "context"]) \ .setOutputCol(["document_question", "document_context"]) spanClassifier = RoBertaForQuestionAnswering.pretrained("algmonquestingansweringmodel_base","en") \ .setInputCols(["document_question","document_context"]) \ .setOutputCol("answer") pipeline = Pipeline().setStages([document_assembler, spanClassifier]) pipelineModel = pipeline.fit(data) pipelineDF = pipelineModel.transform(data) val document_assembler = new MultiDocumentAssembler() .setInputCol(Array("question", "context")) .setOutputCol(Array("document_question", "document_context")) val spanClassifier = RoBertaForQuestionAnswering .pretrained("algmonquestingansweringmodel_base", "en") .setInputCols(Array("document_question","document_context")) .setOutputCol("answer") val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document_assembler, spanClassifier)) val pipelineModel = pipeline.fit(data) val pipelineDF = pipelineModel.transform(data) Model Information Model Name: algmonquestingansweringmodel_base Compatibility: Spark NLP 5.2.1+ License: Open Source Edition: Official Input Labels: [document_question, document_context] Output Labels: [answer] Language: en Size: 463.5 MB References https://huggingface.co/weijiang2009/AlgmonQuestingAnsweringModel-base

entry.title: English allenai_biomed_roberta_base_emrqa RoBertaForQuestionAnswering from aaditya
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained RoBertaForQuestionAnswering model, adapted from Hugging Face and curated to provide scalability and production-readiness using Spark NLP.allenai_biomed_roberta_base_emrqa is a English model originally trained by aaditya.

Download Copy S3 URI

How to use



document_assembler = MultiDocumentAssembler() \
    .setInputCol(["question", "context"]) \
    .setOutputCol(["document_question", "document_context"])
    
    
spanClassifier = RoBertaForQuestionAnswering.pretrained("allenai_biomed_roberta_base_emrqa","en") \
            .setInputCols(["document_question","document_context"]) \
            .setOutputCol("answer")

pipeline = Pipeline().setStages([document_assembler, spanClassifier])

pipelineModel = pipeline.fit(data)

pipelineDF = pipelineModel.transform(data)




val document_assembler = new MultiDocumentAssembler()
    .setInputCol(Array("question", "context")) 
    .setOutputCol(Array("document_question", "document_context"))
    
val spanClassifier = RoBertaForQuestionAnswering  
    .pretrained("allenai_biomed_roberta_base_emrqa", "en")
    .setInputCols(Array("document_question","document_context")) 
    .setOutputCol("answer") 

val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document_assembler, spanClassifier))

val pipelineModel = pipeline.fit(data)

val pipelineDF = pipelineModel.transform(data)

Compatibility: Spark NLP 5.2.1+

entry.title: English bert_finetuned_squad_cojocaruvicentiu RoBertaForQuestionAnswering from cojocaruvicentiu
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained RoBertaForQuestionAnswering model, adapted from Hugging Face and curated to provide scalability and production-readiness using Spark NLP.bert_finetuned_squad_cojocaruvicentiu is a English model originally trained by cojocaruvicentiu.

Download Copy S3 URI

How to use



document_assembler = MultiDocumentAssembler() \
    .setInputCol(["question", "context"]) \
    .setOutputCol(["document_question", "document_context"])
    
    
spanClassifier = RoBertaForQuestionAnswering.pretrained("bert_finetuned_squad_cojocaruvicentiu","en") \
            .setInputCols(["document_question","document_context"]) \
            .setOutputCol("answer")

pipeline = Pipeline().setStages([document_assembler, spanClassifier])

pipelineModel = pipeline.fit(data)

pipelineDF = pipelineModel.transform(data)

    .setInputCol(Array("question", "context"))

entry.title: English bertin_roberta_base_spanish_finetuned_qa_tar RoBertaForQuestionAnswering from dccuchile
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained RoBertaForQuestionAnswering model, adapted from Hugging Face and curated to provide scalability and production-readiness using Spark NLP.bertin_roberta_base_spanish_finetuned_qa_tar is a English model originally trained by dccuchile.

Download Copy S3 URI

How to use



document_assembler = MultiDocumentAssembler() \
    .setInputCol(["question", "context"]) \
    .setOutputCol(["document_question", "document_context"])
    
    
spanClassifier = RoBertaForQuestionAnswering.pretrained("bertin_roberta_base_spanish_finetuned_qa_tar","en") \
            .setInputCols(["document_question","document_context"]) \
            .setOutputCol("answer")

pipeline = Pipeline().setStages([document_assembler, spanClassifier])

pipelineModel = pipeline.fit(data)

pipelineDF = pipelineModel.transform(data)




val document_assembler = new MultiDocumentAssembler()
    .setInputCol(Array("question", "context")) 
    .setOutputCol(Array("document_question", "document_context"))
    
val spanClassifier = RoBertaForQuestionAnswering  
    .pretrained("bertin_roberta_base_spanish_finetuned_qa_tar", "en")
    .setInputCols(Array("document_question","document_context")) 
    .setOutputCol("answer") 

val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document_assembler, spanClassifier))

val pipelineModel = pipeline.fit(data)

val pipelineDF = pipelineModel.transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: bertin_roberta_base_spanish_finetuned_qa_tar
Compatibility: Spark NLP 5.2.1+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [document_question, document_context]
Output Labels: [answer]
Language: en
Size: 462.2 MB

References
